./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_mux_one_hot.v Cov: 94.1% 

   1: 
   2: module bsg_mux_one_hot #(parameter width_p="inv"
   3:                          , els_p=1
   4: 			 , harden_p=1
   5:                          )
   6:    (
   7:     input [els_p-1:0][width_p-1:0] data_i
   8:     ,input [els_p-1:0] sel_one_hot_i
   9:     ,output [width_p-1:0] data_o
  10:     );
  11: 
  12:    wire [els_p-1:0][width_p-1:0]   data_masked;
  13: 
  14:    genvar                          i,j;
  15: 
  16:    for (i = 0; i < els_p; i++)
  17:      begin : mask
  18:         assign data_masked[i] = data_i[i] & { width_p { sel_one_hot_i[i] } };
  19:      end
  20: 
  21:    for (i = 0; i < width_p; i++)
  22:      begin: reduce
  23:         wire [els_p-1:0] gather;
  24: 
  25:         for (j = 0; j < els_p; j++)
  26:           assign gather[j] = data_masked[j][i];
  27: 
  28:         assign data_o[i] = | gather;
  29:      end
  30: endmodule
  31: 
  32:
